## GPUObject interface

Base class for a GPU object

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface GPUObject<T = unknown> extends IEventTarget<{
    disposed: null;
}> 
```
**Extends:** [IEventTarget](doc/markdown/./base.ieventtarget.md)<!-- -->&lt;{ disposed: null; }&gt;
